name: Plant Shape
summary: You can take the form of a plant creature.
description:
You can take the form of a plant creature. Add the forms listed in plant form to your wild shape list; if you don't have wild shape, you can instead cast plant form once per day, heightened to the same level as your highest-level druid spell slot. Whenever you're polymorphed into another form using wild shape, you gain resistance 5 to poison.Plant Shape Leads To...

Reactive Transformation
